title: EUROPE RESEARCH ROUNDUP- BAE Systems, Harbour Energy, Totalenergies
text:
â€© Feb 25 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including BAE Systems, Harbour Energy and Totalenergies, on Friday.

HIGHLIGHTS

* BAE Systems : JP Morgan raises to neutral from underweight

* Harbour Energy Plc : Peel Hunt raises to buy from add

* Moneysupermarket.com : Peel Hunt raises to buy from add

* Storskogen Group AB (Publ) : JP Morgan cuts to underweight from neutral

* Totalenergies SE : RBC cuts to sector perform from outperform

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Friday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.

* Accor : Morgan Stanley raises target price to EUR 35 from EUR 31

* Adecco Group AG : JP Morgan cuts target price to CHF 50 from CHF 55

* Adevinta ASA : JP Morgan cuts target price to NOK 101 from NOK 106

* Adevinta ASA : UBS cuts target price to NOK 94 from NOK 117

* Aena SME SA : HSBC raises target price to EUR 180 from EUR 170

* Aena SME SA : JP Morgan cuts target price to EUR 160 from EUR 161

* Anglo American : Jefferies raises target price to 3,800p from 3,300p

* Anheuser Busch Inbev SA : Deutsche Bank raises PT to EUR 70 from EUR 68
